definitionGroups.group: Any tree of species of genus Mitragyna:

entries.meaning: A medium-sized tropical African tree, Mitragyna stipulosa (syn. M. macrophylla, nom. illeg.), from the family Rubiaceae.[First attested in the mid 20th century.]
A large-sized tropical African tree, Mitragyna ledermannii (syn. Mitragyna ciliata)
The soft pale wood from the abura tree. [First attested in the mid 20th century.]
